entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Rain at times heavy near Port Renfrew this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 25 mm near Port Renfrew. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening except northwest 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections late this evening and after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:43 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023
